name: Customer Booking Interface
description: This epic covers the development of a user-friendly interface for customers to easily book reservations, including selecting dates, times, and services.

name: Reservation Modification System
description: This epic focuses on allowing customers to modify their existing reservations, including changing dates, times, and service details through a seamless process.

name: Cancellation Workflow
description: This epic outlines the process for customers to cancel their reservations, ensuring that the cancellation is straightforward and includes confirmation notifications.

name: Reservation Confirmation and Notifications
description: This epic involves implementing a system for sending confirmation emails and notifications to customers upon booking, modification, or cancellation of reservations.

name: Admin Reservation Management Dashboard
description: This epic includes the creation of a dashboard for administrators to view, manage, and oversee all customer reservations, including analytics and reporting features.

name: Payment Integration for Reservations
description: This epic focuses on integrating payment processing capabilities to allow customers to securely pay for their reservations at the time of booking.

name: Dynamic Table Allocation
description: Implement a system that dynamically allocates tables based on real-time customer flow and reservation data to optimize seating arrangements.

name: Wait Time Management
description: Develop a feature that estimates and displays wait times for customers, allowing for better planning and customer satisfaction.

name: Reservation Integration
description: Create an integration with the reservation system to ensure that table assignments are aligned with booked reservations, minimizing conflicts.

name: Table Status Tracking
description: Build a tracking system for table statuses (available, occupied, reserved) to provide staff with real-time updates on table availability.

name: Customer Preferences Management
description: Implement a feature that allows customers to specify seating preferences, which can be taken into account during table assignments.

name: Analytics and Reporting
description: Develop analytics tools to report on table usage patterns, helping management make informed decisions about seating arrangements and staffing.

name: Menu Item Management
description: This epic covers the functionality for restaurant owners to add, edit, and delete menu items, ensuring they can keep their offerings up to date.

name: Price Adjustment Features
description: This epic allows restaurant owners to easily adjust prices for menu items, including bulk updates and seasonal pricing strategies.

name: Specials Highlighting
description: This epic focuses on enabling restaurant owners to highlight daily specials or promotions on their menus, enhancing customer engagement.

name: Menu Layout Customization
description: This epic provides tools for restaurant owners to customize the layout and design of their menus, including categories and item arrangements.

name: Nutritional Information Management
description: This epic allows restaurant owners to add and manage nutritional information for each menu item, catering to health-conscious customers.

name: Menu Versioning
description: This epic enables restaurant owners to create and manage different versions of their menus, allowing for seasonal changes or special events.

name: Product Selection and Browsing
description: This epic covers the functionality that allows customers to browse and select products from the online catalog, including filtering and sorting options.

name: Order Customization
description: This epic includes features that enable customers to customize their orders, such as selecting sizes, colors, and additional options.

name: Shopping Cart Management
description: This epic focuses on the shopping cart functionality, allowing customers to add, remove, and modify items before proceeding to checkout.

name: Secure Payment Processing
description: This epic encompasses the payment processing features, ensuring secure transactions through various payment methods, including credit cards and digital wallets.

name: Order Confirmation and Tracking
description: This epic provides customers with order confirmation details and tracking capabilities to monitor the status of their orders post-purchase.

name: User Account Management
description: This epic includes functionalities for customers to create and manage their accounts, view order history, and save preferences for future orders.

name: Shift Management System
description: A comprehensive system for creating, modifying, and managing staff shifts to ensure optimal coverage and efficiency.

name: Time Tracking and Reporting
description: Tools for tracking employee hours worked, generating reports, and ensuring compliance with labor regulations.

name: Automated Scheduling Alerts
description: Notifications and alerts for staff regarding upcoming shifts, changes in schedules, and coverage needs during peak times.

name: Employee Availability Management
description: A feature that allows employees to submit their availability and preferences for shifts, facilitating better scheduling.

name: Coverage Optimization Tool
description: An analytical tool that assesses staffing levels and suggests optimal shift patterns to meet demand during peak hours.

name: Shift Swap and Trade System
description: A platform for employees to request and manage shift swaps with colleagues, ensuring flexibility and coverage.

name: Table Booking System
description: A comprehensive system that allows customers to easily book tables at their preferred dining locations, including options for date, time, and party size.

name: Order Tracking Dashboard
description: An interactive dashboard for customers to track their orders in real-time, providing updates on preparation and delivery status.

name: Customer Feedback Mechanism
description: A feature that enables customers to provide feedback on their dining experience, helping restaurants improve service and offerings.

name: User Profile Management
description: A section for customers to manage their profiles, including personal information, booking history, and preferences.

name: Promotions and Discounts Module
description: A feature that allows customers to view and apply promotions or discounts during the booking process, enhancing customer engagement.

name: Reservation Confirmation Notifications
description: Automated notifications sent to customers confirming their reservations and providing reminders as the booking date approaches.
